https://tmrev.io/movie/746080-BoxBallet 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/itMGtzYChYodWjZ1mBs5EPCDqPP.jpg Once a fragile ballerina Olya meets a rude and gloomy boxer Evgeny. The contrast between the worlds of the heroes and their worldview is so striking that the very possibility of intersection of heroes appears as a miracle. Are the heroes ready to accept the same timid feeling that arose between them? Will they overcome everything external and superficial, behind which fragile loving souls are hidden. BoxBallet
